eu.stratosphere.nephele.io

Class AbstractRecordWriter<T extends Record>

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.stratosphere.nephele.io.AbstractRecordWriter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the record that can be emitted with this record writer
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Writer<T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BroadcastRecordWriter, RecordWriter

    public abstract class AbstractRecordWriter<T extends Record>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Writer<T>
    Abstract base class for a regular record writer and broadcast record writer.
    Author:
    warneke

      Constructs a new record writer and registers a new output gate with the application's environment.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractRecordWriter

        public AbstractRecordWriter(AbstractInvokable invokable,
                            ChannelSelector<T> selector,
                            boolean isBroadcast)
        Constructs a new record writer and registers a new output gate with the application's environment.
        Parameters:
        invokable - the application that instantiated the record writer
        selector - the channel selector to be used to determine the output channel to be used for a record
        isBroadcast - true if this record writer shall broadcast the records to all connected channels, false/ otherwise

    • Method Detail

      • emit

        public void emit(T record)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 java.lang.InterruptedException
        This method emits a record to the corresponding output gate. The method may block until the record was transfered via any of the connected channels.
        Specified by:
        emit in interface Writer<T extends Record>
        Parameters:
        record - The record to be emitted.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown on an error that may happen during the transfer of the given record or a previous record.
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • subscribeToEvent

        public void subscribeToEvent(EventListener eventListener,
                             java.lang.Class<? extends AbstractTaskEvent> eventType)
        Subscribes the listener object to receive events of the given type.
        Parameters:
        eventListener - the listener object to register
        eventType - the type of event to register the listener for

      • unsubscribeFromEvent

        public void unsubscribeFromEvent(EventListener eventListener,
                                 java.lang.Class<? extends AbstractTaskEvent> eventType)
        Removes the subscription for events of the given type for the listener object.
        Parameters:
        eventListener - the listener object to cancel the subscription for
        eventType - the type of the event to cancel the subscription for

      • publishEvent

        public void publishEvent(AbstractTaskEvent event)
                  throws java.io.IOException,
                         java.lang.InterruptedException
        Publishes an event.
        Parameters:
        event - the event to be published
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - thrown if an error occurs while transmitting the event
        java.lang.InterruptedException - thrown if the thread is interrupted while waiting for the event to be published

           throws java.io.IOException,
